Time Travel: The clock could be a portal to a different time, allowing the user to travel back in time to when they had more time to complete the assignment.
Reversible Time: The clock could have a reverse mode, where time flows in reverse, and the user can undo any mistakes or missed deadlines.
Time Warp: The clock could be a portal to different time zones, allowing the user to access different time periods to gather information or complete tasks.
Time Loop: The clock could create a time loop, where the user relives the same day over and over again until they complete the assignment.
